thought: The soul_campfire requires a stick, so I will start by crafting a stick. To craft a stick I need to place 2 planks above each other. There is 1 acacia_plank in slot 13, which I will move to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
